name: WiZZiD - Online co-op
description:
Aim of the game: 

You have to kill all goblins and collect bloodpoints before moving to the next floor.

This is game is designed to be played multiplayer but can be played solo. In order to find a friend, Login, Sessions tab, You can either create or refresh and find another game, then click join.

Controls:

Move - WASD

Shoot - Mouse

Credits:
